note_models.name: Chess 2.0 your Move

tmpls.afmt:
<iframe id="analysisBoard" height=900 width=900></iframe>

<script>
  var PGN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:PGN}}`);
  document.getElementById("analysisBoard").src = `_ChessTempoViewer.html?PGN=` + PGN + `&flip=false`;
</script>
tmpls.name: Card 1
tmpls.qfmt:
<iframe id="Board" height=730 width=680></iframe>

<script>
  var PGN = `{{text:PGN}}`.replace(/\[Puzzle_Length.*?\]/, '').replace(/\[Tactic_line.*?\]/, ''); //compatability with chess.com puzzles
  var PGN = encodeURIComponent(PGN);
  document.getElementById("Board").src = `_chess3.0.html?PGN=` + PGN + `&flip=false`;
</script>
